content: with any standard worsted weight yarn work in the round to create this simple classic crochet hat use half double stitches throughout to create a dense thick construction to keep your head warm and the cold out this pattern is just for a solid color hat but if you have experience with changing colors you can easily use as many colors as you want **skill level ** beginner **size** newborn 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months toddler child teen/small adult medium adult and large adult **supplies** any worsted weight yarn size 5 0 mm h-8 crochet hook yarn needle for weaving in ends © copyright 2016 prime publishing llc all rights reserved
